name: Better Elementor Addons
author: BetterAddons

sections.description:
Better Elementor Addons is an elementor add-on to showcase your Count down, Service Box, Team, Testimonial, our team, and Heading with card style/design. This is an simple and flexible way to add new elements/widgets to Elementor Page Builder.

Note: This plugin is a widget of Elementor Page Builder and will only work with Elementor Page Builder installed.

Elementor Widgets & Addons Included:

  1. Icon Box (FREE-New): Very good Elementor Widget to present your business page for Elementor comes with many customization options.
  2. Button advanced (FREE-New): Very good Elementor Widget to present your business page call to actions for Elementor comes with many customization options.
  3. Countdown (FREE): Very good Elementor Widget to comming soon page for Elementor comes with many customization options.
  4. Team Members (FREE): Very good Elementor Widget to list team members, co-workers, etc. Team Members Widget for Elementor comes with many customization options.
  5. Testimonials (FREE): The modern Testimonials Widget us available with many customization options.
  6. Heading title (FREE): Elementor Heading Widget has many customization options and ready-made heading styles.
  7. Image Box (FREE): An advanced Image Box Widget for Elementor with customization options.
  8. featured box (FREE): The modern Featured product Widget us available with many customization options.

Blog/Post Elements

  1. Blog list (FREE): To list the posts widget available with many customization options.
  2. Post title (FREE): The title of the post widget available with many customization options.
  3. Post Featured Image (FREE): An image assigned to the post widget available with many customization options.
  4. Post Author (FREE): The post author information widget available with many customization options.
  5. Post Date (FREE): Publish date or last modified date widget available with many customization options.
  6. Post Comments (FREE): The default Comments Template included in the theme widget available with many customization options.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I add multiple Widgets elements with single page?

Yes, you can. Better Elementor Addons for elementor plugin gives you the ability to add multiple card styles on same page. You just need to drag and drop that module multiple times and select different card styles whatever you want.

Can I change color or customize card style as per my wish?

Yes, You can customize it. We provided all possible options in backend to update it from default Better Widgets.

sections.reviews:
Great plugin but no support

By danthemannl on February 3, 2023

This is a great plugin but it looks like there is no more support. The plugin is not updated since 2022 and errors are shown in the console

No options

By orki on November 20, 2021

No options for most of the addons like the Better Slider is going way too fast...

No support answers, no way to get in contact. Need help with Slider.

By michaelvahl on October 12, 2021

No support whatsoever. Many people need help with their plugin, but there is no answer and no contact details on their website. We need help with many things - the biggest problem being that their Better Slider is going way too fast, and their is no option to slow it down.

Frequently updated

By smartinnovates on September 9, 2021

Great work

short_description: Showcase useful elements with card style for elementor page builder.
